meta.name: Keywords
meta.content: Thatcher School District, Thatcher Unified School District. Thatcher Unified Schools, Thatcher Schools

div.data-caption: Anonymous Alerts - report student concerns quickly
div.alt: Anonymous Alerts - report student concerns quickly

div.span: Click on District or School News for information or select from the links above or below:

span.span: – Single Sign-on Portal. Instructions to use this site can be found here.
– Online portal to student's grades and other information.

p.span: Google Apps - Student access to email and student files.
Type to Learn – Typing Program for K-8.
Thinkcentral - For grades K-6, online access to Go Math & Journeys Reading program.
Math Online Textbook - For grades 7-12, access to math book online. Username and password required.

img.style: width: 152px; height: 66px; margin-right: auto; margin-left: auto; display: block;

span.span: Use this link to access the Tax Credit Donation form.
Use this link to access the Free & Reduced lunch application.
Online portal to student grades and other important information.

p.span: EZ SchoolPay - Use this link to check lunch account balances and to put money on account.

span.span: Use this link to pay your school fees online with a debit/credit card.
Use this link to pay your school fees online with a debit/credit card.

p.span: Thatcher High School has partnered with Parchment to order and send your transcript and other credentials securely. Click on the order records button.
